li.p: We had a blast at Nature's Classroom!

div.class: col-md-4 col-sm-12 scrollimation scale-in d2 pull-left

div.p: So much fun for all! We read, dressed up as our favorite characters and saw Mr. Keplesky’s awesome video!

div.class: col-md-4 col-sm-12 scrollimation scale-in d2 pull-left

div.p: On December 13, 2019, CES took part in the state-wide Connecticut Children’s Medical Center fundraiser, PJ Day for the Kids! Hosted by the Lea

p.strong: Due to the Corona virus pandemic Chaplin Elementary School will be closed from March 16th through May 20th.
Please view this important video from Principal Chavez:

p.a: Please read this letter for more information.

div.p: Charter Communications is offering 60 days of free Internet access for students who do not have Internet at home. Click here to learn more.

p.a: Also, enjoy a read aloud from Mr. C.
